title: Nah.
review:
Not sure why they thought making this film was a good idea tbh.

They try to be Pixar/Disney but fall short in every single aspect.

It's somewhat rare that I sit and count the minutes until a movie is over.

title: Good
review:
I have not yet seen the original from 1985, but I really liked this remake, which, contrary to the original, is animated. Of course not Pixar, but okay.
Not the big movie, but good entertainment. And with the original music with Sebastian. Great.
